name: The Interview (itch) (JensPetter)
description:
Somewhere in the future, there is a company called “Company Inc” that overrules all other companies. Thousands of people work in this company which is why they are so popular because they produce a lot of work from all those people working. The company is always looking for new employees in various different work fields so that they can produce even more work. Bad work is not permitted in this company since bad work results in bad success.

As a recruiter for this company, you are responsible for accepting qualified candidates and rejecting not qualified applicants. How many candidates can you correctly accept and reject? Find out in”The Interview”.

The Interview is played by using the mouse to navigate and click your way through the game.

This project is an entry for the Games Programming Challenge 2021 (Rising Star category), hosted by Grads in Games.
